caption.p: Correlation matrices showing multiple phenolics, flavonoids, condensed tannins with IC 50 values of DPPH scavenging activities. (A) and (B) depict Pearson’s correlation matrix for RS and leaves respectively while (C) and (D) shows Spearman’s correlation for Suaeda monoica RS and leaves respectively. The scale on the right side shows color codes with corresponding r values.
